name: Barb
description:
Experience the life of Barbara, an ordinary person with very normal daily rituals... or is there more to it?

Made during Global Game Jam 2016 at Kenney Land


"If you're anything like me, you'll spend another five going 'oooh' and 'aaah' over all the chunky low-poly models, exquisitely lit."

(Tom Sykes, PC Gamer) "There are many ways people can send a message in order to prove a point, but it's always very thrilling do it in the form of a major twist at the end of an apparently normal story."

(Alexandru Dulcianu, ★★★★☆ (3.5/5) Softpedia)


Instructions

Use the mouse to navigate (right click to move, left click to interact). You can also walk around using the arrow keys and WASD.

Credits

  • Programming: Josh Naylor
  • Art/modeling: Kenney Vleugels
  • Hand animations: Suchada Brassé
  • Audio: Angelo Di Totto

Diversifiers

  • Comic book colours
  • Gandhi's Game
  • One hand tied behind my back
  • Loudmouth

Version 2.0

  • Recreated from the ground up
  • More interactive objects
  • New control scheme
